resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>81386</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>5042</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Athletics -  (2) Throwing, Running, Jumping</string>
            <string language="es">Atletismo – (2) Lanzamiento, Correr, Saltos</string>
            <string language="ga">Lúthchleasaíocht – (2) Caitheamh, Rith, Léim</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Athletik - (2) Werfend, Laufen, Springend</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Athlétisme - (2) Jetant, Exécution, Branchant</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Athletics - (2) Jogando, Funcionar, Saltando</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Atletismo - (2) Gettando, Funzionare, Saltante</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αθλητισμός - (2) ρίχνοντας, τρέξιμο, άλμα</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Second athletics lesson plan which outlines a warm-up, throwing, running and jumping activities. Children explore various ways of throwing and jumping, they practise sprinting and find out about sports that involve throwing.</string>
            <string language="es">El segundo plan de lección de atletismo esboza actividades de calentamiento, lanzamiento, carrera y saltos. Los niños exploran varias formas de lanzamiento y saltos, practican la carrera de velocidad y descubren los deportes relacionados con lanzamientos.</string>
            <string language="ga">An dara ceacht lúthchleasaíochta a imlíníonn gníomhaíochtaí téimh suas, caithimh, ritheachta agus léim. Féadfaidh na leanaí bealaí éagsúla caithimh agus léim a fhiosrú, déanann siad cleachtadh ar ráibeáil agus foghlaimíonn siad faoi spóirt ina bhfuil cait</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Physical Education</string>
            <string language="es">Educación física. Plan de lección</string>
            <string language="ga">Corpoideachas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Lesson Plan</string>
            <string language="ga">Plean Ceachta</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zweiter Athletiklektionplan, der eine Vorwärmung
umreißt, Aktivitäten werfend, laufen lassen und springen. 
Kinder erforschen verschiedene Methoden des Werfens und des 
Springens, üben sie zu sprinten und finden über Sport 
heraus, der miteinbeziehen zu werfen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Deuxième plan de leçon d'athlétisme qui trace 
les grandes lignes d'un préchauffage, jetant, gérant et branchant 
des activités. Les enfants explorent de diverses voies du 
lancement et de sauter, ils pratiquent sprinting et découvrent au 
sujet des sports qui impliquent le lancement.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Segunda planta da lição do athletics que 
esboça um warm-up, jogando, funcionando e saltando atividades. 
As crianças exploram várias maneiras de jogar e de saltar, 
praticam sprinting e encontram para fora sobre os esportes que 
envolvem jogar.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Secondo programma di lezione di atletismo che 
descrive un preriscaldamento, gettando, facendo funzionare e saltando 
le attività. I bambini esaminare le varie modalità di gettare 
e di salto, si esercitano in sprinting e scoprono circa gli sport che 
coinvolgono gettare.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δεύτερο σχέδιο μαθήματος αθλητισμού που περιγράφει 
μια προθέρμανση, ρίχνοντας, τρέχοντας και πηδώντας τις 
δραστηριότητες. Τα παιδιά ερευνούν τους διάφορους τρόπους 
και, ασκούν και ανακαλύπτουν για τον αθλητισμό που περιλαμβάνει τη
ρίψη.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leibeserziehung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektion-Plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Éducation physique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Plan de Leçon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Instrução Física</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Planta Da Lição</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Formazione Fisica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Programma Di Lezione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φυσική αγωγή</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχέδιο μαθήματος</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
